en.en_gw: Do you want to enable the public network gateway of router "{0}"?
en.diss_fip: Do you want to dissociate the Floating IP?
en.info_en_gw: External gateway is the way which connects your routers and external network. Enabling external gateway can make your VDC have ability to communicate external network. Still need to bind a floating IP to an instance before they can reachable from poublic network.
en.info_dis_gw: Router will not be able to reachable from public network after being disabled. All instances associating this router won't be available via floating IP.
en.msg_diss_subnet: Do you want to dissociate this subnet from the router?
en.tip_dis_gw: Do you want to disable external gateway of router "{0}" ?
en.tip_related_subnet: Already filtered subnets with the gateway-status off.
en.tip_router_has_subnet: Cannot delete router which has been related to subnets
en.remote_tip: Please fill out the IP address of peer side router, it must be a public IP, like 1.2.3.4.
en.target_tip: Please fill out the network address of target network, like 192.168.4.0/24 CIDR of target network can't be overlapped with subnets connected to this router.

zh-CN.en_gw: 是否开启路由器"{0}"上的公网网关？
zh-CN.info_en_gw: 公网网关是路由器与外部网络（公网）通信的通道，开启公网网关让您的VDC内部具备与公网通信的能力。开启公网网关后，还需要给云主机绑定公网IP地址才能进行通信。
zh-CN.info_dis_gw: 关闭公网网关后路由器将不能与外部网络（公网）通信。该路由器下的所有的云主机将无法通过公网IP访问。
zh-CN.msg_diss_subnet: 该操作将此子网从路由器上断开。
zh-CN.tip_dis_gw: 是否关闭路由器"{0}"上的公网网关？
zh-CN.tip_related_subnet: 已过滤未开启网关的子网
zh-CN.tip_router_has_subnet: 不能删除有子网关联的路由器
zh-CN.remote_tip: 请填写对端路由的IP地址，须为合法的IP地址，例如1.2.3.4
zh-CN.target_tip: 请填写对端路由器的IP地址，例如192.168.0.4/24 目标网络不能和本路由器已有的私有网络重复
